review_data.title: Poor service and quality
review_data.content: Deliveries are often delayed and service orientation is poor. Delivery personell is often unfriendly, delivered pizza is already cold and the quality of the food is medium at best. Pizzas are quite expensive - bad price / quality ratio. Disappointing experience.More

review_data.title: Ordered via web, got burnt pizza delivered

review_data.title: Freshly made pizza
review_data.content: Compared to other pizzerias this one garnishes the "funghi" pizza with fresh mushrooms. Very good! The pizzas come in three different sizes and you can order them to go for 4.- less. Considering that you have to put away your tray after eating, the price...More

review_data.title: Quasi una pizza di Italia
